In this menu you can install applications to do various things, like add trainers to games or copy games to your HDD.
DVD2Xbox is used to rip game discs to your Xbox hardrive. It can also be used to rip audio CDs & DVD discs.

Item.arg2: This will install DVD2Xbox to E:\Applications\DVD2Xbox\ if there is currently a application residing there it will be overwritten.
This will install DVD2Xbox to F:\Applications\DVD2Xbox\ if there is currently a application residing there it will be overwritten.
This will install DVD2Xbox to G:\Applications\DVD2Xbox\ if there is currently a application residing there it will be overwritten.

List.Item: DVDX v2 is used to play DVD movies without the need for the DVD kit.

Item.arg2: This will install DVDX v2 to E:\Applications\DVDX v2\ if there is currently a application residing there it will be overwritten.

List.Item: That's DVDX v2 installed to "G:\Applications\DVDX v2\"
The EEPROM Backuperer is used to backup your current Xbox EEPROM. The output files will be placed in "E:\Backups\EEPROM\", note this is a silent app. ie, you will not get a GUI.

Item.arg2: This will install EEPROM Backuperer to E:\Applications\EEPROM Backuperer\ if there is currently a application residing there it will be overwritten.

List.Item: That's EEPROM Backuperer installed to "E:\Applications\EEPROM Backuperer\"

List.Item: That's EEPROM Backuperer installed to "G:\Applications\EEPROM Backuperer\"

List.Item: Just a few homebrew games all setup & ready to play.

This is a PC port of Alien vs Predator by SirLemonhead & it functions surprisingly well, considering the port was abandoned. This version uses the unreleased beta that fixed most issues with the original release.
AVP Gold installed to.\n\n"E:\Homebrew\Aliens versus Predator Gold\"
AVP Gold installed to.\n\n"F:\Homebrew\Aliens versus Predator Gold\"
AVP Gold installed to.\n\n"G:\Homebrew\Aliens versus Predator Gold\"
This allows you to play Doom, Doom II, Ultimate Doom, Final Doom: TNT Evilution & Final Doom: Plutonia Exp.
Super Mario War is a Super Mario multiplayer game. The goal is to stomp as many other Marios as possible to win the game. It's a tribute to Nintendo and the game Mario War by Samuele Poletto.
Super Mario War installed to.\n\n"E:\Homebrew\Super Mario War 1.8\"
Super Mario War installed to.\n\n"F:\Homebrew\Super Mario War 1.8\"
Super Mario War istalled to.\n\n"G:\Homebrew\Super Mario War 1.8\"

Addons created/converted by Rocky5 & Bless

For information on this mod please
read the Info.txt file located in

"D:\Games\Mods\Operation Flashpoint Elite"

There is to much to list here.
Create the following Profiles to unlock the Hidden cheat menu. Once the following profiles have been created the hidden features menu will be unlocked.

Cheat options:
Enhanced view distance and ambient life
"Dentist Guba"
Same as Dentist Guba then some more stuff
"QA Tester"
Unlocks everything
"XaX 1985"

Now that you have unlocked the hidden menus it's time to activate them. From any menu you hold the left trigger and the white button simultaneously. A menu will appear. Now press right on the DPAD and this should enable the option you have selected.
You will know you have toggling the option correctly when you receive a message in the top left corner that says "hidden objects unlocked.

Mod by Rocky5

1. New Cockpit view
2. New sounds
3. New Skins for cars 512x512 or 1024x1024
4. New weather effects
5. New Car damage
6. Loads of small tweaks and changes
Enter your profile name as: Creole

In this menu you can update your "Xbox Softmodding Tool" to the latest version, or upgrade older softmods as well as revert to a stock Xbox.
If you don't know what these do, or you don't know how they work, do not use them. I take no responsibility for you mucking about with things you don't understand.
This option is for upgrading your 2014 softmod installation to the new version. Your current dashboard will not be effected.

Item.arg2: I'm about to do some checks, to makes sure you're running my 2014 Softmod kit. Continue with the Upgrade?

List.Item: OK it would appear you're running my 2014 Softmod, so I will continue onto the next step.
This option is for updating your "Xbox Softmodding Tool" installation to the latest version. Your current dashboard will not be effected.

Item.arg2: I'm about to do some checks, to makes sure you're running my Xbox Softmodding Tool. Continue with the Upgrade?

List.Item: OK it would appear you're running my Xbox Softmod, so I will continue onto the next step.
"This option is for upgrading your old softmod to my "Xbox Softmodding Tool" or it can be used to install a clean installation of the "Xbox Softmodding Tool". Are you sure you want to do this?"

Please note, This will revert your Xbox to a state similar to how it was when originally purchased. You will have two options to pick from, "A Clean State" or "keep Game Saves". Note: This will not change you Xbox eeprom or keep any DLC, Applications eg... on the E partition.

I will install all the exploitable saves so you can resoftmod the system at a later date. I also include the UDDAE exploit so you can resoftmod the system without needing one of the exploitable games.

Item.arg2: Are you sure you want to continue?

List.Item: These applications are to be used by people that know what they are doing. I take no responsibility for users formatting or breaking there Xbox.
This is the latest version of Chimp & it supports all Xbox versions. You use Chimp to install larger HDD's for Softmodded Xbox's, please search Youtube for "Chimp 261812"

Item.arg2: This will install Chimp 261812 to E:\Applications\Chimp\ if there is currently a application residing there it will be overwritten.

List.Item: This is only to be used on a HDD that has been formatted with UnleashX ( Hexen disc eg... ) EvolutionX Dash or older versions of Chimp. ( 2618 or lower ).
This is used to write a partition table to the HDD so you can use the "C, E, F & G takes remaining space" option in Chimp 261812.

Item.arg2: This will install XBP Table Writer to E:\Applications\XBP Table Writer\ if there is currently a application residing there it will be overwritten.

List.Item: Installing app to E:\Applications\XBP Table Writer\
That's XBP Table Writer installed to "E:\Applications\XBP Table Writer\"

XBpartitioner is used to Format large HDD's, mainly the Extra Partitions (F & G) after cloning with older versions of Chimp. So please be careful with this applications. It's other use, is custom partitions.

Item.arg2: This will install XBpartitioner to E:\Applications\XBpartitioner\ if there is currently a application residing there it will be overwritten.

List.Item: Be careful when using this, as you can potentially remove something you're not meant to.
